resources.string: Naufal Fawwaz Andriawan is a student at Universitas Pendidikan Indonesia, pursuing a major in software engineering. Currently in his sixth semester, he is a dedicated and passionate individual with a keen interest in coding and sports. Naufal is currently engaged in an internship at the prestigious Apple Developer Academy, where he is gaining valuable industry experience. With a strong affinity for programming and a love for staying active through sports, Naufal combines his technical skills with a well-rounded lifestyle.
